name: Eco Featherly - Rated M for Mature - Fall 2018
name_original: Eco Featherly - Rated M for Mature - Fall 2018
description:
Platform - Windows

Please download, unzip the compressed folder and run the .exe. Enjoy!

Game Summary - Rated M for Mature - 

Have you ever wondered what a pigeon does in its spare time? Have you ever walked down the street and saw how much trash there was? Well this little pigeon has. 

Meet Bip, a young paper boy pigeon determined to clean up his home neighborhood. On your weekend paper route, you'll leave Bop at home to chill while you deliver your daily load of newspapers. You come home to find your precious Bottlecap collection has gone missing. Bop seems to remember the local gang stopping by to take a look, but he was snoozing. What does he know. Where did your Caps go?

You have to be careful.  Members of the local gang, the RatPak, are very territorial and don't like dumb birds sticking their beaks in someone elses business.

Artist Links

https://kuroheta.itch.io/eco-featherly

A game by Sam Pickett
